main event: A round, white object, possibly a balloon, was observed in Santa Margarita, California on June 5, 1955 for approximately 15 to 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was the size of a small house at arm's length., The sighting was reported by a civilian observer., Two reports were made from nearly the same location about the same time., The object moved in a northeast direction., The conclusion of the report suggested it might have been a balloon.
